description: Product Description DETAILS STRONG SUCTION CUPS Our DOPROP bath and shower mats feature hundreds of suction cups that work on any smooth and clean bathtub or floor and ensures optimum grip and safety when showering or bathing. Press the bath mat to adsorb it on the smooth bathtub. No worry about slipping. SOFT DIAMOND SURFACE The diamond design of our DOPROP bathtub mat offers not only safety but also comfort without any irritating, larger unevenness. They are unique and beautiful, providing a super comfortable massage experience for your feet in the shower. GREAT DRAINAGE HOLES Our DOPROP bath and bathtub mat macthed large drain holes,as they allow water to pass through,no worry hydrops. It highly increases the circulation of water in the bathtub and prevent the water pressure from loosening the suction cups attached to the bathtub. EASY CARE Our DOPROP bathtub mat is so easy care it.Machine-washable to facilitate hassle-free maintenance. To wash at any time, simply toss the mat into the machine and enjoy its fresh appearance. Air Dry for years of safe, healthy, hassle-free use.
